entries.description: CloudFormation: render stack detail views on stack change
Lambda deploy always creates new version
CloudFormation: Show hook invocations in stack events on failure

AWS Toolkit now supports console credentials, allowing you to use AWS Management Console sign-in credentials for programmatic access. The login webview now pre-selects Console credentials as the recommended authentication option (previously Enterprise SSO was the first choice). When overwriting an existing console session on a profile, you'll be prompted to confirm whether to proceed or cancel.
Lambda Remote Invoke panel now supports invoking Lambda durable functions
CloudFormation: group stack events by operation id and display in stack events view
